title: New River Gorge National River: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Hikers gaze at the New River Gorge Bridge from an overlook. Louise McLaughlin   Â            Places to Go   Places throughout the park that you won't want to miss.         Things to Do   Check out all of the many recreational activities available at New River Gorge National River.              Directions   Directions to visitor centers and other park locations.         Visitor Centers   Begin your trip to the park by stopping at one of the park's four visitor centers.         Basic Information   Basic information for trip planning including operating hours and seasons              Permits and Reservations   Information about reserving shelters at Grandview and about permits and commercial use authorizations for activities and events in the park        Accessibility   Find out about accessible areas throughout the park.         Ranger-led Programs   Find out what interpretive programs are going on in the park.               Brochures   Download all of our brochures and publications.         Fees and Passes   Information about fees and park passes        Weather   Be prepared and check the local forecast before hitting the trail or heading down the river.
